revised_title: Effects of Rarefaction and Gas Mixtures on Flame and Combustion
tldr: This article explores the effects of rarefaction and gas mixtures on flame and combustion. The author, Humphry Davy, examines how different gases and rarefied atmospheres affect the combustion of various substances. He also investigates the influence of heat on combustion and explosion, and the role of metallic and other tissues in preventing the combustion of explosive gaseous mixtures.
